Leviticus__02.3__Holy of holies: : That is, most holy, as being dedicated to God, and set aside by his ordinance for the use of his priests.
Leviticus__02.11__Without leaven: : No leaven nor honey was to be used in the sacrifice offered to God; to signify that we are to exclude from the pure worship of the gospel, all double dealing and affection to carnal pleasures.
Leviticus__02.13__Salt: : In every sacrifice salt was to be used, which is an emblem of wisdom and discretion, without which none of our performances are agreeable to God.
